fr.liglab.adele.icasa

Interface iCasaCommand


  • public interface iCasaCommand
    An ICommandService is a service that can be executed with a set of arguments. It can execute a block of code and then returns the result object of executing this code.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        Object execute(InputStream in,
             PrintStream out,
             org.json.JSONObject param)
               throws Exception
        Execute a block of code and then returns the result from execution. This method should use in and out stream to print result instead of the direct use of System.in and System.out
        Parameters:
        in - : the input steam.
        out - : the output stream.
        param - a json object of parameters
        Returns:
        the result from the execution
        Throws:
        Exception - if anything goes wrong

      • validate

        boolean validate(org.json.JSONObject param)
                 throws Exception
        To validate the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        param - The parameters in JSON format
        Returns:
        true if parameters are valid, false if not.
        Throws:
        Exception
